snippet.title: Sneak Peek 2.0 Trailer
snippet.description:
Support us now and get access to play sneak peek right away! 
NEXTCARGAME.COM

The response to our first technology sneak peek was so amazing that we decided to give the players even more cool stuff to have fun with and release a new version of the sneak peek! We have added new destructive machinery, more dynamic stuff to blow up, spectacular stunts and an awesome physics cannon that we use to play with our physics engine. With the physics cannon you too will now have a chance to cause mayhem to your heart's content by launching missiles, throwing stuff around and destroying the environment as well as the cars! It will basically blow your socks off! Enjoy!
